DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , randomise clinical trial investigator aim assess nasal high frequency oscillatory ventilation ( nHFOV ) could use primary modality respiratory support late preterm term infant transient tachypnea newborn require non-invasive ventilation .
DOC.brief_title: nHFOV Versus nCPAP Transient Tachypnea Newborn
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Non-invasive High Frequency Oscillatory Ventilation ( nHFOV ) , aim combine efficacy high frequency ventilation gentleness non-invasive support current evidence suggest nHFOV may superior non-invasive mode term support alveolar ventilation . There several publish neonatal study nHFOV therapy rescue mode even premature infant ; however date study publish efficacy nHFOV primary mode non-invasive support . The investigator aim assess efficacy nHFOV late-preterm term infant transient tachypnea newborn primary mode non-invasive support . METHOD : The investigator propose test effectiveness nHFOV late-preterm term neonate transient tachypnea newborn ( TTN ) Silverman Score 4 admission require non-invasive respiratory support . Nasal high frequency oscillatory ventilation may effective decrease duration non-invasive respiratory support total oxygen therapy ( H1 hypotheses ) . The current literature estimate incidence transient tachypnea newborn 5.7 per 1000 birth . Assuming 5 % difference primary outcome group significant , alpha value set 0.05 power study 80 % , 220 infant must recruit arm ( nCPAP nHFOV ) investigation . Chest X-ray , complete blood count , C-reactive protein capillary blood gas analysis ( per unit protocol ) obtain upon admission neonatal intensive care unit . A Silverman Score obtain participant upon admission score 4 support one method ( randomization ) . Initial nHFOV setting : MAP : 8cmH2O , Frequency:10 MHz , Amplitude:35 cmH2O ( adjust achieve adequate chest wall vibration ) , I : E=1:1 FiO2 : adjust keep preductal sPO2 % 90-95 . Initial nCPAP setting : PEEP:6 cmH2O FiO2 : adjust keep preductal sPO2 % 90-95 . Failure primary mode define FiO2 requirement > % 60 , capillary blood gas obtain 4th hour therapy show pH < 7.20 pCO2 > 65 cmH2O . When nCPAP nHFOV failure occur , nasal intermittent positive pressure ventilation ( nIPPV ) apply rescue therapy follow setting : Frequency:30/min , PIP:18 cmH2O , PEEP:6 cmH2O , inspiration time:0.50 sec. , inspiratory flow:10 L/min , FiO2 : adjust keep preductal sPO2 % 90-95 . If rescue mode fails , infant intubate conventional mechanical ventilation initiate .
